attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned what the instant reintroduction of
National Service: Compulsory military service requiring all citizens and those wishing to gain entry into the United Kingdom, to participate for a minimum period of a year between the ages of 18 and 25.

for those that are conscientious objectors they should be used as a 'humanitarian force' to assist with aid projects both foreign and domestic.

Offenders and those in receipt of ASBO orders from the age of 16 would be required to spend a minimum of 2 years regulatory service.

We insist to the Coalition Government that this needs to be implemented now and without prejudice.
